column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Katara says : " The plan is simple : This wanted poster says you 're worth a lot of money ; Ten times more than you 've made in all of your scams .
#Text=You betrayed me !
#Text=" Katara says : " You brought this on yourself .
#Text=I had no choice .
#Text=" Town authority says : " You did the right thing by turning in the Runaway .
#Text=" Katara says : " The right thing is its own reward .
#Text=" Town authority says : " Well , I 'm happy to hear you say that .
#Text=" Katara says : " But , I still want the actual reward .
#Text=" Town authority says : " Of course .
#Text=Right this way .
#Text=" Toph says : " Hey !
#Text=What kind of cell is this ?
#Text=" Female guard says : " A wooden one .
#Text=" Town authority says : " That 's her !
#Text=That 's the girl you were looking for !
#Text=" Aang says : " Do you think this scam of theirs should be taking this long ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I was just wondering the same thing .
#Text=We 'd better check it out .
#Text=You two behave .
#Text=Appa 's in charge .
#Text=" Toph says : " Wait !
#Text=It 's a trap !
#Text=" Katara says : " Really ?
#Text=No kidding !
#Text=Is that why we 're sitting in a wooden cage right now ?
#Text=Gee , how 'd you figure out it was a trap ?
#Text=" Toph says : " Not for us , Katara !
#Text=We 're the bait !
#Text=He wants Aang !
#Text=" Katara says : " I ca n't believe I 'm so stupid !
#Text=See ?
#Text=This is exactly why I 'm against these scams !
#Text=I knew this would happen !
#Text=" Toph says : " But , this was your idea .
#Text=" Katara says : " I know .
#Text=I wanted to show that I 'm not so motherly .
#Text=I wanted to show you that I can have fun too .
#Text=" Toph says : " Katara , you are fun .
#Text=If nothing else , you 're at least fun to argue with .
#Text=" Katara says : " I know your relationship with your parents is complicated .
#Text=And I should n't have said what I said .
#Text=" Toph says : " It 's okay .
#Text=I was really mad when you said that because ... well because , maybe it 's true .
#Text=I try not to think about it , but when I left , I probably really hurt them .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Where do you think they might be ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Where do you think anyone is ?
#Text=Sokka , watch out !
#Text=It 's Sparky - Sparky - Boom Man !
#Text=" Sokka says : " You know , I 'm starting to think that name does n't quite fit .
#Text=" Katara says : " What are we gon na do ?
#Text=" Toph says : " I do n't know .
#Text=I wish we had some earth or water .
#Text=We need bendables .
#Text=" Katara says : " What about your meteor bracelet ?
#Text=You can make a saw .
#Text=" Toph says : " I left it back at camp .
#Text=I was worried they would take it .
#Text=" Toph says : " Um , Katara ?
#Text=Are you okay ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Just fine .
#Text=" Toph says : " Well , what are you doing ?
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'm making my own water .
#Text=" Toph says : " Katara !
#Text=You 're a genius !
#Text=A sweaty , stinky genius !
#Text=" Sokka says : " This guy is too good !
#Text=He shoots fire from his brain !
#Text=" Aang says : " We should split up .
#Text=He ca n't chase us both .
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , get up !
#Text=" Toph says : " Let 's get out of here !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hey , I got it !
#Text=The perfect name for that guy : " Combustion Man ! "
#Text=" Toph says : " Good job , Sokka .
#Text=Now let 's get outta here before Combustion Man catches us .
#Text=" Sokka says : " See ?
#Text=It fits so well !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Well , I 'm exhausted .
#Text=Hawky , how about you , buddy ?
#Text=Yeah .
#Text=You 're such a lazy little bird .
#Text=" Toph says : " Katara ?
#Text=I need your help .
#Text=" Katara says : " What is it , Toph ?
#Text=" Toph says : " I need you to write some things down for me .
#Text=I wan na send a letter to my parents .
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'll be happy to help .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hey , where 'd Hawky go ?
#Text=" Main Aang Appa Katara Momo Sokka Toph Antagonists Combustion Man says : " Minor Dealer Town authority " Sokka says : " What 's out here ?
#Text=" Toph says : " A lot , actually .
#Text=There 's hundreds of little ... " Aang says : " Shh !
#Text=I know you can see underground , but do n't ruin the surprise .
#Text=Just watch .
#Text=Yeah !
#Text=I 'm putting an orchestra together .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Orchestra , huh ?
#Text=Well , la - di - da .
#Text=" Sokka says : " This is great and all , but do n't we have more important things to worry about ?
#Text=We should be making plans .
#Text=" Toph says : " We did make plans .
#Text=We 're all picking mini-vacations .
#Text=" Sokka says : " There 's no time for vacations .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm learning the elements as fast as I can .
#Text=I practice hard every day with Toph and Katara .
#Text=I 've been training my arrow off !
#Text=" Katara says : " Yeah , what 's wrong with having a little fun in our down time ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Even if you do master all of the elements , then what ?
#Text=It 's not like we have a map of the Fire Nation .
#Text=Should we just head west until we reach the Fire Lord 's house ?
#Text=Knock , knock .
#Text=Hello , Fire Lord ?
#Text=Anybody home ?
#Text=I do n't think so .
#Text=We need some intelligence if we 're going to win this war .
#Text=" Katara says : " All right , we 'll finish our vacations and then we 'll look for Sokka 's intelligence .
#Text=" Aang says : " Your turn , Katara .
#Text=Where would you like to go on your mini-vacation ?
#Text=" Katara says : " How about the Misty Palms Oasis ?
#Text=That sounds refreshing .
#Text=" Aang says : " Oh , yeah , I 've been there .
#Text=It 's a pristine natural ice spring .
#Text=And I usually do n't use the word " pristine " .
#Text=It 's one of nature 's wonders .
#Text=" Aang says : " Must 've changed ownership since I was here .
#Text=" Zei says : " One mango , please .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I do n't see anything wrong with having one of those fruity beverages while we plan our strategy .
#Text=Excuse me .
#Text=" Aang says : " No worries , I clean up easy .
#Text=" Zei says : " You 're a living relic .
#Text=" Aang says : " Thanks , I try .
#Text=" Zei says : " An Air Nomad , right in front of me .
#Text=Professor Zei , head of anthropology at Ba Sing Se University .
#Text=Tell me , which of the air temples do you hail from ?
#Text=" Aang says : " The Southern Temple .
#Text=" Zei says : " Oh , splendid !
#Text=Now tell me - what was the primary agricultural product of your people ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Uh , are fruit pies an agricultural product ?
#Text=" Zei says : " Oh , truly fascinating .
#Text=That is one for the journal .
#Text=" Sokka says : " So Professor , you 're obviously a well - traveled guy .
#Text=Do you have a more current map ?
#Text=Ours seems to be a little dated .
#Text=" Zei says : " Certainly .
#Text=" Sokka says : " What , no Fire Nation ?
#Text=Does n't anybody have a good map of that place ?
#Text=" Katara says : " You 've made a lot of trips into the desert .
#Text=" Zei says : " All in vain , I 'm afraid .
#Text=I 've found lost civilizations all over the Earth Kingdom , but I have n't managed to find the crown jewel : Wan Shi Tong 's Library .
#Text=" Toph says : " You spent years walking through the desert to find some guy 's library ?
#Text=" Zei says : " This library is more valuable than gold , little lady .
#Text=It is said to contain a vast collection of knowledge , and knowledge is priceless .
#Text=" Toph says : " Hmm , sounds like good times .
#Text=" Zei says : " Oh , it is .
#Text=According to legend , it was built by the great Knowledge Spirit , Wan Shi Tong , with the help of his " foxy " knowledge seekers .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Oh , so this spirit has attractive assistants , huh ?
#Text=" Katara says : " I think he means they look like actual foxes , Sokka .
#Text=" Zei says : " You 're both right .
#Text=Handsome little creatures .
#Text=Wan Shi Tong and his knowledge seekers collected books from all over the world , and put them on display for mankind to read , so that we might better ourselves .
#Text=" Sokka says : " If this place has books from all over the world , do you think they 've got info on the Fire Nation ?
#Text=A map , maybe ?
#Text=" Zei says : " I would n't know .
#Text=But if such a thing exists , it 's in Wan Shi Tong 's Library .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Then it 's settled .
#Text=Aang , I do believe it 's my turn .
#Text=I 'd like to spend my vacation at the library !
#Text=" Toph says : " Uh , hey , what about me ?
#Text=When do I get to pick ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " You got ta work here a little longer before you qualify for vacation time .
#Text=" Toph says : " Hmph !
#Text=" Zei says : " Of course , there 's the matter of finding it .
#Text=I 've made several trips into the Si Wong Desert and almost died each time .
#Text=I 'm afraid that desert 's impossible to cross .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Professor , would you like to see our sky bison ?
#Text=" Zei says : " A sky bison ?!
#Text=You actually have one ?
#Text="
